status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
While testing KitchenSink, I wasn't able to zoom in view to make it a full screen. 
*It happens  on iPad with iOS 6.0 only.Not a regression, occurs on 2.1.3*
It is possible to use zoom in on iOS lower then 6.0.

Steps to reproduce:
1) Build KS 
2) Install on iPad iOS 6.0
3) Navigate to Phone>Play Movie>Local
4) Start movie playback
5) Zoom in

Result:
Unable to zoom in

Expected:
Should be able to zoom in
fields.summary: KitchenSink: Phone - Unable to play full screen movie on iPad with iOS 6.0
fields.environment:
Tested on:
Titanium Studio, build: 3.0.0.201211071923
Titanium SDK, build: 2.1.4.v20121030173408
Devices:
iPad mini iOS 6.0.1
iPad4 iOS 6.0

comments.body:
This seems like an unintentional behavior that Apple was giving out to the users,( un-pinching to bring the movie to fullscreen and pinching to bring it back). This was causing some problem amongst the users, so they have decided to remove this unintentional behavior from iOS 6.0. There are somewhat similar discussion about this problem in Apple developer forum. 

Marking ticket as not our bug.
